summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Sand Point Way, southeasterly side only, from Ivanhoe Place Northeast to East 64th Street; and easterly side only, from 60th Ave. Northeast to approximately 290 feet north of East 72nd Street; and certain other streets and avenues; by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 18605 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district thereof, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds."
